definitions.definition: not suitable or appropriate in a particular situation
definitions.sensetop: it is inappropriate (for somebody/something) (to do something)inappropriate to/for something

examples.text: **It would be inappropriate for me to** comment.
examples.contextForm: it is inappropriate (for somebody/something) (to do something)

examples.text: What's the best way for a teacher to deal with inappropriate behaviour?
This treatment was highly inappropriate in her case.
The existing library is totally inappropriate to our needs.
The size of the machines makes them inappropriate for domestic use.
Your bright red coat would be quite inappropriate for a funeral.
